title: Polki Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram
materials: Emerald (Panna). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This modern haaram features a series of interconnected, intricately crafted triangular settings, each showcasing a dazzling Polki diamond. The design culminates in a stunning oval-shaped emerald pendant, surrounded by a halo of delicate diamonds. The triangular motif symbolizes strength and stability, a modern twist on traditional Indian designs. The reverse of the emerald pendant showcases meticulous kundan setting (if applicable) - a testament to the craftsman's dedication.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (from the diamonds) with a vibrant pop of green from the emerald.
occasions: and high-profile events. Also suitable for milestone celebrations like anniversaries or significant birthdays. A statement piece for the modern Indian woman who values tradition with a contemporary flair.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional Polki diamond craftsmanship with a modern, geometric design. The high-quality emerald adds a touch of regality. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, and the design allows for comfortable wear despite its grand appearance. The use of Polki diamonds bestows a unique, ethereal sparkle unlike traditional brilliant-cut diamonds. Crafted with utmost care and precision in our Hyderabad workshop, each piece embodies the legacy of our heritage.
